category.name: Integration.TCAA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAA123_extobject_file_name_rule_use_MFK
preference.preference_description: Through this option it is possible to control the Teamcenter object identifier used for file renaming of attached reference links. It can be the Item ID or the multifield key. In case of multifield key, the object identifier is composed by the values of the attributes involved in the multifield key definition for the current item type concatenated through the character -. The value of this option is taken into consideration only if file renaming is enabled (that is TCAA123_extobject_file_rename is not set to 0). Possible values: 0 - use Item ID as Teamcenter object identifier for file renaming of attached reference links (Default) 1 - use multifield key as Teamcenter object identifier for file renaming of attached reference links
